thread.title: ETOA membership reaches an all-time high
thread.title_full: ETOA membership reaches an all-time high

author: eTN Global Editor
title: ETOA membership reaches an all-time high
text:
ETOA membership reaches an all-time high     
LONDON, England - 2015 has been another record breaking year for ETOA and its members. Since its founding by tour operators in 1989, as the campaigning voice for inbound travel to Europe, ETOA has established itself as the leader in bringing global and specialist, long and short-haul operators, from leading origin markets to develop business with tourism suppliers across all European markets. 
Jay Munro-Michell, ETOA's Head of Commercial Development said “For the first time ever, ETOA has reached 800 member companies, having grown by over 100 in 2015. This means over 4000 business professionals now have access to ETOA’s membership services”. 
ETOA’s largest member only event, the Global European Marketplace (GEM) takes place on Friday 30th October and a record turnout is expected.
